scripts.b: yarn cleanup && yarn build:esm && yarn build:cjs
scripts.release:major: yarn b && npm version $(semver $npm_package_version -i major) && npm publish --tag latest
scripts.release:minor: yarn b && npm version $(semver $npm_package_version -i minor) && npm publish --tag latest
scripts.release:patch: yarn b && npm version $(semver $npm_package_version -i patch) && npm publish --tag latest
